title: The Canterbury Tales of Geoffrey Chaucer: Special Edition for Young Readers
description: This version of Geoffrey Chaucer's Canterbury Tales for children is the work of A. Kent and Constance Hiatt. The charming illustrations are by Gustaf Tenggren. Included are prose versions of several tales, such as The Wife of Bath's Tale, Patient Griselda, The Black Rocks of Brittany, The Tale of Chanticleer, and the Pardoner's Tale, and in modern nonsense verse, The Rime of Sir Topas.
author: Geoffrey Chaucer
